verses.content: Kawtkhâr vêngtuhai pâwl ṭhea chun: Kora mihai chu: Kore naupa Meselemia le Asaph naupasalhai laia mi chu.
Meselemia chun naupasalhai a nei a, nâulutîr chu Zekaria, a pa- hnina Jediael, a pathumna Zebadia, a palina Jathniel;
a pangana Elam, a parukna Jehohanan, a pasarina Eliehoenai.
Chun, Obed-edom chun nau- pasalhai a nei a; nau lutîr chu Semaia a na, a pahnina chu Jehozabad, a pathumna chu Joa, a palina chu Sakar, a pangana chu Nethanel;
a parukna chu Ammiel, a pasa- rina chu Issakar, a parietna chu Peullethai; Pathienin ama chu mal a sâwm sih a.
A naupa Semaia chun naupasal- hai an pahnamhai chunga rorêltuhai chu an pieng a; anni chu mi hrât khawkhêng ruok an ni sih a.
Semaia naupasalhai chu: Othni le, Rephael le, Obed le, Elzabad, a unauhai chu mi hrât khawkhêng an nih; Elihu le Semakia hi.
Hienghai po po hi Obed-edom naupasalhai thlahai chu an nih, anni le, an naupasalhai le an unauhai khawm mi hrât, rawngbâwlnaa thil- thawtheitak ruok sâwmruk pahni, Obed-edom thlahai an nih.
Chun, Meselemia khawmin unauhai le naupasal mi hrâttak, sâwmpariet a nei bawk a.
Hosa, Merari thlaa mi khawm chun naupasalhai a nei a; a hotu tak chu Simri a nih (nau lutîr a ni nawh a chu a pa chun hotu takah a siem a nih),
a pahnina chu Hilkia, a pa- thumna chu Tebalia, a palina chu Zekaria; Hosa unauhai le naupasal- hai po po chu an rêngin sâwmpathum an nih.
LALPA ina rawngbâwl dinga, an unauhai anga chanpuol nei ve, hotu takhai, kawtkhâr vêngtuhai pâwl chu hienghai hi an nih.
Dai kawtkhâr tina ding chun, an pahnam dungzui peiin, a chîn le lien ni leh ai an sân pei a.
Chun, saktieng panga dinga aisânna chu Selemia chungah a tluh a. A naupa Zekaria, remruottu vartak ta ding chun ai an sân a; a aisânna chu hmârtieng pang dingin a tluh a.
Obed-edom ta ding chun simtieng pang a tluh a, a naupasalhai ta dingin, thil siekhâwmna in chu a tluh a.
Suppim le Hosa ta ding chun thlangtieng pang a tluh a, Salleketh dai kawtkhâra inthawka intlar peia lam fe peia khan.
Saktieng panga chun Levi mi paruk an na, hmârtieng ni khatah pali, simtieng ni khatah pali, chun, thil siekhâwmna in ta dingin, pahni peiin.
Thlangtieng panga Parbar ta dingin a lampuiah pali, a Parbar hmunah pahni.
Hienghai hi kawtkhâr vêngtu- hai Kora mihai le Merari mihai thlahai pâwlhai chu an nih.
Chun, Levi mihaia chun, Ahija chu Pathien ina rohai chunga le, thil inhlân tahaia rohai ta dinga enkawltu a nih,
Ladan naupasalhai: Ladana inthawka Gerson thlahai, Gerson mi Ladan kuoma ṭhang pahnamhai luhai chu: Jehieli.
Jehieli naupasalhai chu: Zetham, a unaupa Joel leh, LALPA in ro siena in chunga hotu an nih.
Amram miah, Izhar miah, Hebron miah, Uzziel miah:
Mosie naupa, Gersom naupa Sebuel chu sum siekhâwmna chunga rorêltu a nih.
A unauhai: Eliezer naupa Rehabia, a naupa Jesaia, a naupa Joram, a naupa Zikri le a naupa Selomoth hai an nih.
Hi Selomoth le a unauhai chu, thilinhlân, lal David le pahnam luhai le, sâng khat chunga hotuhai le za khat chunga sipai hotuhaiin an in- hlânhai po po siekhâwmnahai chunga enkawltuhai an nih.
Indonahai hnênahaia râllâk thilhai chu LALPA in siemṭhatna ding chun an pêk a.
Chuong zâwlnei Samuel hai, Kis naupa Saula hai, Nera naupa Abner hai, Zeruia naupa Joab haiin an hlânthienghai le, mi tukhawma thil an hung pêkhai chu Selomoth le a unauhai kuta chun a um vawng a.
Izhar mihaia chun, Kenania le a naupasalhai chu Israel ram ta dinga puotienga sinthawnahaia hotuhai le rorêltuhai an nih.

Hebron mihaia chun, Hasabia le a unauhai chu, mi huoisen ṭhieu, sâng khat le za sari chu Jordan râl, thlangtienga Israel rama lal ta dinga rawngbâwlnaahai le, LALPA sin- thawnahai po po chunga enkawltuhai an nih.

Hebron mihaia chun, Jerija pahnam inthla dân anga Hebron mi chu a hotu a nih. David rorêl a kum sâwmlinaa chun nasataka zawng an na, Gileada Jazera chun mi hrât khawkhêng anni laia chun hmu suok an na.

Chun, a unau mi hrât khaw- khênghai chu sâng hni le za sari an na; anni chu lal David chun an pahnam luhai chu, lal chungthua le Pathien thil chungthu tinrêngah Reuben mihai, Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai enkawltuhaia a siem an nih.
